subcommands.name: kick
subcommands.description: Remove a user but allow them to rejoin

subcommands.name: ban
subcommands.description: Remove a user and prevent them rejoining

subcommands.name: tempban
subcommands.description: Sets a ban on a user temporarily

subcommands.name: softban
subcommands.description: Purge a user's messages with a quick ban and unban

subcommands.name: masskick
subcommands.description: Remove up to 5 users from the server at once
